nodes.text: Fren Nurook was a female Ithorian scientist. She lived in Glare Peak on Tivar II for five years, and was recruited by Rebel Alliance officer Jaxon Brand after she was fired from Roskam Mechanized Systems for suspicion of Rebel sympathies.
She was one of the agents deployed to rescue downed Rebel pilots.
Fren was one of the pre-generated characters used in Fantasy Flight Games' special promotion, Rescue at Glare Peak.
